aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.description: Cures all status problems in your party.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: In a Double Battle, user randomly attacks with a partner's move.

blaze kick.name: Blaze Kick
blaze kick.description: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.description: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

brick break.name: Brick Break
brick break.description: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

calm mind.name: Calm Mind
calm mind.description: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.description: Changes user's type according to the location.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

cosmic power.name: Cosmic Power
cosmic power.description: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

covet.name: Covet
covet.description: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

dive.name: Dive
dive.description: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.description: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

eruption.name: Eruption
eruption.description: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

facade.name: Facade
facade.description: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

fake out.name: Fake Out
fake out.description: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.description: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack by two stages.

focus punch.name: Focus Punch
focus punch.description: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

follow me.name: Follow Me
follow me.description: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.description: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's last move is depleted.

hail.name: Hail
hail.description: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

helping hand.name: Helping Hand
helping hand.description: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

ice ball.name: Ice Ball
ice ball.description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.description: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.description: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

knock off.name: Knock Off
knock off.description: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

magic coat.name: Magic Coat
magic coat.description: Any special move is reflected back to the attacker.

memento.name: Memento
memento.description: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

mud sport.name: Mud Sport
mud sport.description: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

nature power.name: Nature Power
nature power.description: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

odor sleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odor sleuth.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

poison tail.name: Poison Tail
poison tail.description: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.description: User's used hold item is restored.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: Power increases if user was hit first.

sand tomb.name: Sand Tomb
sand tomb.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

secret power.name: Secret Power
secret power.description: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

silver wind.name: Silver Wind
silver wind.description: May raise all stats of user at once.

skill swap.name: Skill Swap
skill swap.description: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

sky uppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
sky uppercut.description: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

slack off.name: Slack Off
slack off.description: User recovers half its max HP.

smelling salts.name: Smelling Salts
smelling salts.description: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.description: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

spit up.name: Spit Up
spit up.description: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.description: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.description: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

torment.name: Torment
torment.description: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

trick.name: Trick
trick.description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

uproar.name: Uproar
uproar.description: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

volt tackle.name: Volt Tackle
volt tackle.description: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

water sport.name: Water Sport
water sport.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

water spout.name: Water Spout
water spout.description: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

weather ball.name: Weather Ball
weather ball.description: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

wish.name: Wish
wish.description: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.description: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.
